WorkItem.Custom: It was completed for the demo, however this feature/function is not being use in the beta or release version.  It is now marked as close.
WorkItem.Description:
The user can navigate the decision tree in the left panel.  Check boxes on categories and properties will recalculate scores for any combination of decision tree items and will assign a color to the site poloygon from red = 0 score to green = 1 score with yellow = 0.5.
 
This capability depends on the scoring table.
Category rows are sum of leaf scores within the category
Overall site score is sum of all leaf scores
Selecting a category always selects all leaf scores in the category
Any combination or subset of leaf and categories results in a single score which is a sum of all associated scores.
